ModMetaData.name: Outfitter
ModMetaData.author: Killface, Fluffy, soulkata
ModMetaData.description:
Allows pawns to factor in all kinds of gear stat offsets other than just armor. - Defaults to sensible priorities based on work types assigned and map seasonal temperatures. - Allows you to finetune, add and/or remove priorities. - Takes personal traits like temperature preference or mental states into account. - No naked pawns!
Original version of Outfitter by Fluffy. Original version of AutoEquip by soulkata. This is a fusion of both mods.
